properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who am I that the highest King would welcome me? I was lost, but He brought me in Oh His love for me Oh His love for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Free at last, He has ransomed me His grace runs deep While I was a slave to sin, Jesus died for me Yes, He died for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who the Son sets free Oh is free indeed I’m a child of God, yes, I am In my Father’s house There’s a place for me I’m a child of God, yes, I am In my Father’s house There’s a place for me I’m a child of God, yes, I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am chosen, not forsaken I am who You say I am You are for me, not against me I am who You say I am You are for me, not against me I am who You say I am I am who You say I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who the Son sets free Oh is free indeed I’m a child of God, yes, I am In my Father’s house There’s a place for me I’m a child of God, yes, I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
